name: YOU CAN'T FUCK ON AN EMPTY STOMACH Demo
detailed_description:
An adventure in a world based on ancient Japanese fairy tales.
With several muscle studs, you'll have sensual and naughty experiences♥

This is a Demo of indie bara hentai RPG, made with RPG Maker MV.


---------------------------------------------------------------
・Symbol Action Encounter
・Side view Battle system, with Timing Attacks
・Click handjob mini-game
・Sex Battle mini-game
・Hentai cut-in
・Relief items for easy mode
Average play time: 6 hours or more.
---------------------------------------------------------------

This game includes straight sex, but you can avoid with options.
You can see CGs with talking to a blue haired guy.

----------------------------------------
【Field】
Move : Cursor keys
Dash : Shift+Cursor keys *you can choose default dash on config.
Decide : Enter/Z/Space
Cancel : Esc/X
Menu Open/Close : Esc/X

【Battle】
Choose : Cursor keys *sometimes enemies don't order as they seem.
Decide : Enter/Z/Space
Cancel : Esc/X

【Special Events】
Massage : Mouse
Throw dice : Enter

【Mouse】
Decide/Talk/Move　：　Right Click
Cancel/Menu : Left Click

*Please check trial version to make sure this game works in your computer.

pc_requirements.minimum:
